message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your generosity, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $16,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
